text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Finally, the day of the Tracen Meet<n>has come.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I see the stands are positively<n>packed, as always.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Yeah, this is Tracen's big event, after<n>all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan Fans
text_block_list.text: Ryaaaan! You can do it! We've got<n>your back, Ryan!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That explains why your fans are<n>more energetic than usual.
However...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Family Fans
text_block_list.text:
McQueen! Show 'em what a Mejiro<n>can do! Get out there
and do the<n>Mejiro name proud!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As a fellow Mejiro, I must also<n>uphold a certain standard.
Do not<n>expect me to go easy on you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, you're really something,<n>McQueen. You always do
your best to<n>meet everyone's expectations.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Is that justification for you to lose?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Surely you don't think it would beacceptable to lose today becauseI have some grand, noble reasonfor racing and you don't... do you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: McQueen...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ryan... My question still stands.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Why did you come to Tracen<n>Academy?

text_block_list.name: Race Staff A
text_block_list.text: McQueen, Ryan! Please get ready for<n>your race!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (I wonder...)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(When did I start wondering if it was<n>okay for me to win?
And... when was<n>it that I started having that feeling<n>every
time I see you?)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Our runners have taken their places at<n>the starting gate. The
3,200 meter turf<n>race... begins now!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We've got a fantastic lineup today,<n>but all eyes are on our
two Mejiro<n>racers—Mejiro McQueen and Mejiro<n>Ryan!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(McQueen... You're like the ideal<n>Umamusume to me...
You're elegant<n>and proud, just like a Mejiro<n>successor
should be.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(For as long as I can remember, I've<n>been by your side.
I've seen it<n>all—your willpower, your hard work...<n>I've
watched you fall down, only to<n>get back up.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (So, when I race you or others like<n>you...)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (Maybe... I feel like it'd be okay for<n>me to lose. Is that it?)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We've reached the final 1,000 meter<n>mark! McQueen is
among the leading<n>pack, while Ryan trails behind. Is her<n>
heart not in it?!

text_block_list.name: Young Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff...

text_block_list.name: Young Ryan
text_block_list.text: I did it! I won!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Ryan kicks it into high gear!<n>That acceleration is
crazy!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(No! No, that's not it at all! Sure, I've<n>wondered if it would be
fair for me to<n>win, but...)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (I never EVER thought it would be<n>okay for me to lose!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
(No way, no how! Even when we<n>used to race up that hill
together, I—)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: —Aaaargggh!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ryan!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're entering the final stretch!<n>McQueen is in the lead,
with Ryan in<n>fast pursuit! They've both got their<n>eyes on
the finishing post, but only<n>one can cross it first!

text_block_list.name: The Two
text_block_list.text: Urrraauugh! Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Finish! What a close call! The two<n>Mejiros had the crowd
on the edge of<n>their seats! Listen to those cheers!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the end, the winner of the race is...<n>McQueen, by the
thinnest of margins.

text_block_list.name: The Two
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Aaargh! I was so closetoo!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ryan... you...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: You asked me why I came to Tracen<n>Academy, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
If I just liked exercising, I could do<n>that anywhere. There's
no need to<n>enter races if I'm perfectly satisfied<n>with gains
from the gym.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: But now I know... I came to Tracen towin.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I'm here to hone my body and skills,<n>race against the
others, and come out<n>on top... I'm here to beat strong<n>
racers like you, McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Heh... Then I too shall give my all as<n>your opponent. As a
Mejiro, I have no<n>intentions of losing to anyone,<n>
especially you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ha! Yeah, well, when it comes to the<n>gym, I know I've got
you beat.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
These muscles of mine will carry me<n>wherever I need them
to!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan Fanboy
text_block_list.text:
That's the spirit, Ryan! We'll be right<n>there with you the
whole way!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan Fangirl
text_block_list.text: That's right! We've got your back,<n>now and forever!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Whoa... Ehehe... Thanks, guys!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Hey... Thanks for recommending this<n>race to me. It really
was a valuable<n>experience, just like you said.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Um... actually... There's something I<n>wanted to ask you,
b-but you can say<n>no if you want...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Would you... be my trainer?! My one<n>and only trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I grin from ear to ear. I'll have my<n>hands full with such an
enormous<n>talent, but I can't wait to see where<n>the future
takes us both!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
W-wait... "My one and only" kinda<n>sounds like a... l-love
confession,<n>doesn't it? A-ah... Aaaah!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Waaah! Please forget I said that!
